attributes.action: MP Surgeries should be available to their constituents 7 Days a week
attributes.additional_details: Making services and goods available 7 days a week is now part of everyday life and good for the economy. Members of Parliament (MPs) should be available and involved to the same timeline so that they can  better serve those that elect them and those they represent.
attributes.background: If Doctors. Nurses, Fire, Police, Social Care, Local Government and other public services (even the BBC) are available seven days a week then you local MP should also be available too.

rejection.details: Decisions about when (and whether) to hold constituency surgeries are the responsibility of individual MPs, not the Government and Parliament as a whole.
